data.message: What do I do to get my dead husbands face off of face book some one opened a Facebook page in his name with his picture he has been dead for 3 years  . And it's very heartful to me that someone would steal his name and face it was on people you might know his name was Gil Lewis   My name is Frances Lewis lm on face book

replies.message: We're so sorry for your loss, Fran. If Facebook is made aware that a person has passed away, it's our policy to memorialize the account. To learn more about memorializing an account, please visit: on.fb.me/1uKL9Jo. -Rhea
To send a death certificate with all my and his information to a media would be ludicrous. There must be a better way
I found out that someone in upstate New York is using my deceased husband  name on Facebook . Don't how that should be legal
